TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataFieldConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子，可從目前元件的選取資料來源擷取資料欄位清單。

span.span: Provides a type converter that can retrieve a list of data fields from the current component's selected data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以從設計階段元件目前的資料來源擷取資料欄位的清單。 can retrieve a list of data fields from the current data source of a design-time component. 這個型別轉換子正由[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]提供清單中的資料顯示在 [屬性] 視窗中的欄位的值。This type converter is used by [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] to provide the values that appear in the list of data fields in the Properties window. > [!CAUTION] > 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反地，藉由呼叫適當的轉換程式。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[如何： 實作型別轉換子](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). ## Examples [!code-cpp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CPP/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CS/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/VB/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得值，表示轉換器是否可以將指定來源型別中的物件轉換成轉換器原生型別。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the converter can convert an object of the specified source type to the native type of the converter.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換器可以執行轉換，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回`true`如果來源類型是字串。This method returns `true` if the source type is a string. 否則，這個方法一律會傳回`false`。Otherwise, this method always returns `false`.

span.para: 覆寫這個方法，以符合您自己的轉換需求。參數可用來擷取正在叫用轉換子從環境的其他資訊。它可能是，所以您應該隨時檢查。此外，屬性物件也可能會傳回。

Override this method to meet your own conversion requirements. The parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment the converter is being invoked from. It might be , so you should always check. Also, properties of the object might also return .

summary.span: 當資料來源可取用時，取得該資料來源中的資料欄位。

span.span: Gets the data fields present within the selected data source if information about them is available.

returns.span: ，列出標準的可存取資料來源。

span.span: A listing the standard accessible data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用元件的設計工具，來擷取選取的資料來源上的實作。This method uses the implementation on the component's designer to retrieve the selected data source.

summary.span: 取得值，表示 所傳回的標準值集合是否為所有可能值的清單。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection of standard values returned from is a list of all possible values.

returns.span: 如果從 傳回的 是所有可能有效值的獨佔清單，則為 ，如果可能為其他的值，則為 。

span.span: if the returned from is an exclusive list of all possible values that are valid; if other values are possible.

returns.span: 在這個類別中實作時，這個方法永遠傳回 。

span.span: As implemented in this class, this method always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是獨占清單 (例如在列舉資料型別中)，則沒有其他有效值。If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid. 如果清單不是獨佔的則有其他有效值的標準清單值 besides提供。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides.

span.para: 如果您想要轉換的型別支援標準值，請覆寫這個方法。參數可用來擷取正在叫用轉換子從環境的其他資訊。它可能是，所以您應該隨時檢查。此外，屬性物件也可能會傳回。

Override this method if the type you want to convert supports standard values. The parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment the converter is being invoked from. It might be , so you should always check. Also, properties of the object might also return .
